Summary: two red lights criscrossing in the sky above me
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside at about 2:30am to have a ciggarette because my cat woke me up. About a minute into my smoke i observed two red lights glowing in the distance comming from the south headed north. As soon as they got closer they started making a criscross pattern in the sky like they were in formation. I heard no sounds of anykind even crickets went silent. Ive always wondered if anyone had ever reported the same thing? I have also seen other objects in the past and will fill out more reports. Thanks for your time and the hard work you do! Sincerly, Joshua Jorgensen
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Bloomington
There were no other sightings in Bloomington on or around July 15th 2009
